Description: For the safety of your children, we kindly ask that you supervise them closely near the swimming pool. We cannot be held responsible for any accidents that may occur.
Respect the tranquility of our neighbors by keeping noise levels down, especially during late hours.
Conserve energy by turning off lights and appliances when not in use.
Make use of the provided amenities responsibly and report any damages or malfunctions promptly.
Relax, unwind, and savor your time at Villa Monte Kariotes.
Dispose of cigarette butts responsibly; please avoid littering the garden.
Do not tamper with the cleaning and filtering system of the swimming pool; it's maintained regularly.
Pets are not allowed on the beds.
Keep the property secure by locking doors and windows when leaving.
